title: Interaction, Assessment, and Technology Utilization in Distance Education: Netnography-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and project management experience
context.additional_context: A project-based distance education course for corporate managers/leaders to strengthen language learning competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interaction patterns occurring in online forums by applying netnography methodology.
Learners can evaluate the alignment between technological tools and assessment criteria to design effective remote education evaluation systems.
Learners can develop technology-integrated strategies to enhance participation rates in digital community learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
